thread.title: Rickie Fowler destroys haters on Instagram who made fun of his golf swing
thread.title_full: Rickie Fowler destroys haters on Instagram who made fun of his golf swing

author: Luke Kerr-Dineen
title: Rickie Fowler destroys haters on Instagram who made fun of his golf swing
text:
Rickie Fowler destroys haters on Instagram who made fun of his golf swing USA Today Sports 3 hrs ago Luke Kerr-Dineen The next time you feel like dropping some blunt analysis of Rickie Fowler’s golf swing on social media, just know that he might come after you for it.
AdChoices It started when the PGA Tour’s official Instagram account tweeted this harmless picture of Rickie on the range before the start of the Presidents Cup.
Rickie has been working on making his backswing more upright for the better part of the last few years. He’s certainly made progress, which is reflected in his improved results, but dumont_6 still isn’t very impressed:
© Provided by USA Today Sports photo 1 Enter Rickie.
© Provided by USA Today Sports photo 2 Sawyergolf probably said it best.
© Provided by USA Today Sports photo 3
